name: Mobiry Technologies
tag_list: mobile, sms, coupons, platform, voice, text-message
overview:
Mobiry is a mobile messaging platform company that does two things better than anyone else: mobile coupons system for retailers and SMS & voice communication for other organizations.

Mobiry Coupons is an end-to-end mobile platform for deploying mobile coupons via text messaging for retailers, restaurants and other businesses engaged in customer sales and service. It combines innovative business process with state of the art technology and automates all phases of the mobile couponing process, from customer opt-in up to coupon redemption at the point of sale and analytics.

Mobiry Communication platform is a complete solution for outgoing and incoming text (SMS) and voice messaging.
